هنا بامكانك التسجيل علي منصتنا لتقديم خد: Here you can register on our platform to provide the transportation service to others and make a profit
لكي تنضم الي عائلتنا لابد من امدادنا بال: In order to join our family, you must provide us with the data that we need to create a new account.
برجاء استخدام بيانات المعرفه مسبقا للدخو: Please use pre-defined data to log into your account on our platform
ادخل رمز التحقق المرسل الي هاتفك الخلوي: Enter the verification code sent to your cell phone for the investigation
لم يصلني كود ؟ برجاء ارسال كو اخر: I did not receive a code? Please send another code
ادخل رمز التحقق المرسل الي هاتفك الخلوي: Enter the verification code sent to your cell phone for verification. The code remains valid for:
مرحبا بك في منصتنا ! من اجل انشاء حساب ج: Welcome to our platform! In order to create a new account for you as a transportation service provider, follow the following steps
بانشائك حساب جديد لدي منصتنا فان ذلك يعن: By creating a new account with our platform, this means that you have agreed to the terms and policies of the platform, which respect the laws in force in the countries providing the service.
قم برفع صورة من صفحة البيانات الأساسية ل: Upload a photo from the basic data page of the passport
قم برفع صورة من ترخيص السيارة الخاصة بك: Upload a photo of your car license
قم برفع صورة للسيارة: Upload a photo of the car
thanks: We are happy to have you join our family. One of the members will review your request and contact you before we can approve your account .... It may take from one to four full working days. Be patient and everything will be fine.
